poses.name: Tree Pose
poses.description: Stand tall with hands clasped at your chest and raise one foot to your inner thigh. Hold and breathe.

poses.name: Downward Dog
poses.description: Start on your hands and knees, lift your knees and push up, creating an upside-down V shape.

poses.name: Warrior II
poses.description: Extend your arms out to the sides, bend the front knee, and gaze over the front hand.
